Class FileWriterService

  • java.lang.Object
    • file.FileWriterService

  • public class FileWriterService
extends java.lang.Object
    A service which can be used to write a content into a file.

    Pascal Nguyen

      • getFileWriterService

        public static FileWriterService getFileWriterService()

      • saveTextToFile

        public void saveTextToFile(java.lang.String filePath,
                           java.lang.String text)
        Save the given text in the file at the given path.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The path of the file in which to save the content. This parameter can either be a relative path or a full path.
        text - The text to save in the file.

      • saveTextToFile

        public void saveTextToFile(java.lang.String filePath,
                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> multiLineText)
        Save the given text in the file at the given path.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The path of the file in which to save the content. This parameter can either be a relative path or a full path.
        multiLineText - The text to save in the file.
